Sentencas: The aim of this work was to experimentally assess the feasibility of feeding real biomass product gas to solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) for efficient and clean power production.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode

Sentencas: The impact of tars on Ni-GDC anode was the main focus of the experiments.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode

Sentencas: Planar SOFC membranes were operated at two gasification sites: (a) autothermal fixed-bed downdraft gasifier and (b) allothermal bubbling fluidized bed gasifier.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode

Sentencas: In all cases the gas was hot-cleaned from particulates, HCl and H2S. SOFC membranes were tested up to one day on different product gas tar loads (0-3000 mg N m(-3)) with stable performance.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode

Sentencas: SEM/EDS examination of the SOFCs revealed intact anodes; no carbon deposition or other impurities were detected.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode

Sentencas: During testing on high fuel utilization conditions and high steam content, the SOFC lost performance due to anode nickel oxidation.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode

Sentencas: In another extreme case where producer gas particulates reached the SOFC, SEM examination identified secondary tubular shaped carbon structures formed inside the functional layer of the anode.
Titulo: Integrating biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cells: Effect of real product gas tars, fluctuations and particulates on Ni-GDC anode
